result.reason: Application.DoEvents() re-entrancy in RdpProtocol.InitializeActiveXControl allows UI message pump re-entrancy during new RDP connection setup, and async void OpenConnection in ConnectionInitiator can corrupt shared panel state, causing a failed new connection to cascade-drop existing ones.
result.approach: Replace the Application.DoEvents() spin-wait in InitializeActiveXControl with the existing async path (InitializeActiveXControlAsync uses Task.Delay without DoEvents); isolate OpenConnection failures so they cannot affect existing ConnectionWindow panel state or shared _activeConnections list.
